data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Bạc Liêu, Vietnam to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bạc Liêu, Vietnam

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Bạc Liêu, Vietnam. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Bạc Liêu, Vietnam honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 17,005 believers in Bạc Liêu to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Akha people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Akha people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Akha people is yours.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 17,005 believers in the state of Bạc Liêu.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, help the 17,005 believers in Bạc Liêu to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 769,195 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord we pray you unite the 17,005 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Bạc Liêu.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Bạc Liêu
location.cities_list: Bạc Liêu, Thị Trấn Gành Hào, Thị Trấn Ngan Dừa, Thị Trấn Phước Long, Thị Trấn Giá Rai
